trans-unit.source: Specifies a NuGet package source to use during installation.
trans-unit.target: 指定安装期间使用的 NuGet 包源。

trans-unit.source: SOURCE
trans-unit.target: SOURCE

trans-unit.source: You can invoke the tool using the following command: {0} Tool '{1}' (version '{2}') was successfully installed.
trans-unit.target: 安装成功。如果没有进一步的说明，则可直接在 shell 中键入以下命令进行调用: {0}

trans-unit.source: NuGet Package Id of the tool to install.
trans-unit.target: 要安装的工具的 NuGet 包 ID。

trans-unit.source: Installs a tool for use on the command line.
trans-unit.target: 安装在命令行上使用的工具。

trans-unit.source: The NuGet configuration file to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的 NuGet 配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The target framework to install the tool for.
trans-unit.target: 要安装工具的目标框架。

trans-unit.source: Version of the tool package in NuGet.
trans-unit.target: NuGet 中工具包的版本。

trans-unit.source: PACKAGE_ID
trans-unit.target: PACKAGE_ID

trans-unit.source: Please specify one tool Package Id to install.
trans-unit.target: 请指定一个要安装的工具包 ID。

trans-unit.source: Install user wide.
trans-unit.target: 安装用户范围。

trans-unit.source: .NET Install Command
trans-unit.target: .NET 安装命令

trans-unit.source: The settings file in the tool's NuGet package is invalid: {0}
trans-unit.target: 工具的 NuGet 包中的设置文件无效: {0}

trans-unit.source: Tool '{0}' failed to install.
trans-unit.target: 工具“{0}”安装失败。

trans-unit.source: Tool '{0}' failed to install. Please contact the tool author for assistance.
trans-unit.target: 工具“{0}”安装失败。请联系工具作者获取帮助。

trans-unit.source: Tool '{0}' is already installed.
trans-unit.target: Tool '{0}' is already installed.

trans-unit.source: Failed to create shell shim for tool '{0}': {1}
trans-unit.target: Failed to create shell shim for tool '{0}': {1}

trans-unit.source: NuGet configuration file '{0}' does not exist.
trans-unit.target: NuGet configuration file '{0}' does not exist.

trans-unit.source: The tool package could not be restored.
trans-unit.target: 无法还原工具包。

trans-unit.source: Specified version '{0}' is not a valid NuGet version range.
trans-unit.target: Specified version '{0}' is not a valid NuGet version range.

trans-unit.source: Please specify either the global option (--global) or the tool path option (--tool-path).
trans-unit.target: Please specify either the global option (--global) or the tool path option (--tool-path).

trans-unit.source: (--global) conflicts with the tool path option (--tool-path). Please specify only one of the options.
trans-unit.target: (--global) conflicts with the tool path option (--tool-path). Please specify only one of the options.

trans-unit.source: Location where the tool will be installed.
trans-unit.target: Location where the tool will be installed.
